content: The Glazed Reliquary is one of the Curios items in Chapter 2 of Black Myth: Wukong. Unlike some of the other Curios' in this chapter, this one can easily be missed as it is in a rather well-hidden area.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Glazed_Reliquary.md', within the main section titled 'Glazed Reliquary'.
The content is as follows:
The Glazed Reliquary is one of the Curios items in Chapter 2 of Black Myth: Wukong. Unlike some of the other Curios' in this chapter, this one can easily be missed as it is in a rather well-hidden area.
